title: Eleanor Roosevelt National Historic Site: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps            Eleanor's Walk - Top Cottage Trail NPS     Vanderbilt Mansion Trail Map  Home of Franklin D. Roosevelt Trail Map  Eleanor's Walk & Top Cottage Trail Map  The Roosevelt Farm Lane Trail Map  Hyde Park Healthy Trails Walkabout Map      Eleanor Roosevelt NHS site Brochure and Map- Side 1 and Side 2   History of the Farm Lane Dedicated on November 15, 2008   - Bicycles are prohibited December - February   - Bicycles are only allowed on the main Lane from March - November.  - All other trails are prohibited from bicycle use.    In Case of Emergency call 911.
